EcosystemPage.ldjson.software.name: HeyTCM Intelligent TCM Platform
EcosystemPage.ldjson.software.description: A cloud platform that integrates TCM theory with modern technology for intelligent health management, supporting multi-device, data analysis, and personalized health services.
featureList: TCM constitution analysis and health advice
Personalized health reports and trend analysis

openData.title: Open Data: Driving Research and Innovation
openData.desc: The HeyTCM Open Data Platform is dedicated to collecting, organizing, and sharing high-quality TCM health data, providing valuable resources for researchers and developers, and promoting the intelligent development of TCM. We strictly adhere to privacy protection principles, and all data is anonymized.

items.title: Pulse Wave (PPG) Dataset
items.desc: A vast, continuous multi-scenario PPG dataset covering physiological responses of people of different ages, genders, and constitutions in various life scenarios.

items.title: Disease Prescription Database
items.desc: Structured TCM clinical data, including symptom descriptions, tongue and pulse images, syndrome differentiation, prescriptions, and efficacy tracking.

items.title: Weight Loss Database
items.desc: Multi-dimensional weight loss process data, including weight changes, body fat percentage, physiological indicators, dietary records, and emotional state tracking.

cta.title: Explore More Open Data Resources
cta.desc: Visit the HeyTCM Open Data Platform for more high-quality TCM health data to advance research and innovation.

openSource.title: Open Source Projects: Building Intelligent TCM Tools Together
openSource.desc: HeyTCM actively promotes open source projects related to TCM. Developers are welcome to contribute code and suggestions to improve the intelligent TCM toolchain together.

items.title: HeyTCM Open Algorithm Library
items.desc: Covers various intelligent TCM algorithms such as signal processing, health assessment, and data visualization, supporting multi-platform deployment.

items.title: AI Syndrome Differentiation Algorithm Library
items.desc: A machine learning-based TCM syndrome differentiation library supporting multiple sensor data inputs, providing syndrome prediction and interpretability analysis.

items.title: PPG Signal Analysis Toolkit
items.desc: A lightweight pulse wave signal processing library for browser and Node.js, including filtering, feature extraction, and time-frequency analysis.

items.title: TCM Knowledge Graph Framework
items.desc: A structured knowledge graph framework for TCM, modeling and reasoning about meridians, organs, prescriptions, herbs, and more.

items.title: Become an Open Source Contributor
items.desc: We welcome all forms of contributions, including code, documentation, algorithm improvements, bug fixes, or feature suggestions. Whether you are an experienced developer or a TCM practitioner, you can participate in our open source projects.

cta.title: Join Open Source Collaboration
cta.desc: Join the HeyTCM open source community and work with developers worldwide to drive innovation in intelligent TCM tools.

community.title: Co-Creation Community: Connecting Diverse Forces
community.desc: The HeyTCM co-creation community brings together TCM practitioners, developers, researchers, and health enthusiasts, regularly holding online and offline events to promote knowledge sharing and innovative practices.

items.title: Online Co-Creation Meeting
items.desc: Regular online meetings to share the latest research findings and practical experiences.

items.title: Bigu Fasting Circle
items.desc: A safe and scientific community to discuss Bigu fasting practices, share experiences, provide mutual support, and reduce risks. Members include both seasoned practitioners and curious newcomers.

items.title: Shanghan Lun Reading Group
items.desc: A group reading classic TCM texts such as 'Shanghan Lun', reinterpreting ancient wisdom from a modern scientific perspective, with weekly online discussions to tackle challenging chapters together.

items.title: General Discussion Forum
items.desc: A place for free discussion on TCM-related topics, sharing personal health management experiences, asking questions, exploring product tips, and connecting with professionals from various fields.

items.title: Contributors Hall of Fame
items.desc: The vitality of the community comes from the participation and contributions of every member. Whether sharing experiences, answering questions, contributing data, or developing features, every effort drives the progress of intelligent TCM.

cta.title: Join the HeyTCM Co-Creation Community
cta.desc: Connect, learn, and co-create the future with TCM enthusiasts, experts, and developers.
